short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never miss a moment. Quickly and effortlessly with AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop missing important dates, deadlines or action items buried in your emails! 
AI On It is your smart email assistant that identifies events and tasks from your email, helping you stay organized effortlessly.

🎯 Perfect For:

Busy parents managing school communications and activities
Professionals juggling commitments with external clients and partners
Anyone who wants to spend less time tracking crucial info in emails

💪 Benefits:
🕰️ Save Time

- No more manual calendar entry
- Automatic event detection
- Quick task creation
- Streamlined email processing

🗒️ Stay Organized

- Never miss important deadlines
- Keep track of school events
- Manage meeting schedules
- Monitor action items

😌 Reduce Stress

- Stop worrying about missing important dates
- Organize information automatically
- Clear overview of commitments
- Peace of mind knowing nothing slips through

✨ Key Features:
📧 Smart Email Analysis

Detects important information in Gmail email (only upon a button click) 
Identifies dates, times, locations, and action items
Provides clear, organized summaries of key information

📅 One-Click Calendar Integration

Creates Google Calendar events instantly
Automatically fills in all event details
Detects recurring meeting patterns

✅ Task Management

Extracts action items and to-dos from emails
Creates structured tasks with due dates
Keeps track of everything you need to do

🔒 Privacy & Security

Requires minimal permissions to function
Only analyzes email when initiated
No data storage outside your Google account
Secure authentication through Google

Transform your email experience today with AI On It - your intelligent assistant for never missing an important moment again!
